questions.question: Considering the text's overall appearance, what single word best describes the font style used to display the product's ingredients?

What adjective from the ingredient label best describes the origin or cultivation method of the main ingredient?
Disregarding any contextual meaning, what is the word preceding the colon in the visible text?
Judging only by the image, what punctuation mark immediately follows the product's ingredient description?
What is the final word in the visible text, exclusively based on the image?
What single word accurately reflects the color of the text displayed in the product image?
Considering the text's placement, what is the single-word description of its orientation on the packaging surface?
If the text were categorized into parts of speech, what single word best defines 'Ingredients'?
Excluding the ingredient name, what is the only other word present in the label in the given image?
